pages.text: The room with a circle symbol must be a room for explorers because it also has a map that leads to some sort of a composer, as it says on the back.$(br2)$(o) This has to be the place were I can find charm recipes.

It also has a legend:$(br2) Aquamarine - Freedom$(br) Gold - Mountain$(br) Indigo - Support$(br) Ivory - Safety$(br) Lime - Nature$(br) Maroon - Fire$(br) Silver - Fight$(br) Teal - Enhance$(br) Violet - Ghost$(br2) It is not very helpful, I should head there and investigate.
